images.copyright: Christmas market at Belvedere in Vienna, Austria (© Diyana Dimitrova/Alamy)
images.title: Reflecting on Christmas
images.caption: Christmas market at Belvedere Palace in Vienna
images.desc: Christmas markets win the holiday trifecta: You can buy interesting, often handcrafted gifts, they are set in picturesque, romantic towns and villages in Europe, and they tempt you with mulled wine and local delicacies. What's not to like? Christmas markets, or 'Weihnachtsmärkt,' are one of Europe's oldest Advent events.
